  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Muntanyes del món</string>
            <string language="en">Mountains of the world</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berge der Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Montagnes du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Montanhas do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Montagne del mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βουνά του κόσμου</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Treball escolar amb informació sobre els cims més alts de la Terra. En fer clic sobre punts determinats d'un mapamundi s'obren una fitxes tècniques amb informació dinterès (nom, altitud, país, escaladors,  fotografies...) de cada muntanya.</string>
            <string language="en">Student project with information on the highest peaks on the Earth. When clicking on certain points on a world map, an information card pops up with the name, height, country, mountaineers, photos, etc. of the mountain in question.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">país</string>
            <string language="en">country</string>
            <string language="es">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exploració de la terra</string>
            <string language="en">exploration of the earth</string>
            <string language="es">exploración de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia humana</string>
            <string language="en">human geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmerprojekt mit Informationen über die
höchsten Spitzen auf der Masse. Beim Klicken in bestimmten 
Punkten auf einer Weltkarte, knallt eine Informationen Karte oben mit 
dem Namen, der Höhe, dem Land, den Bergsteigern, den Fotos, dem etc. 
des Berges in der Frage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet d'étudiant avec l'information sur les 
crêtes les plus élevées sur la terre. En cliquant sur
certains points sur une carte du monde, une carte de l'information 
saute vers le haut avec le nom, la taille, le pays, les alpinistes, 
les photos, etc. de la montagne en question.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto do estudante com informação nos picos 
os mais elevados na terra. Ao estalar em determinados pontos em 
um mapa do mundo, um cartão da informação estala acima com o nome, 
a altura, o país, os mountaineers, as fotos, etc. da montanha na 
pergunta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto dell'allievo con le informazioni sugli 
più alti picchi sulla terra. Nel scattarsi su determinati punti
su un programma del mondo, una scheda delle informazioni schiocca in 
su con il nome, l'altezza, il paese, i mountaineers, le foto, ecc. 
della montagna in questione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα σπουδαστών με τις πληροφορίες για τις 
υψηλότερες αιχμές στη γη. Κατά κρότο σε ορισμένα σημεία σε
έναν παγκόσμιο χάρτη, την κάρτα πληροφοριών σκάει επάνω με το 
όνομα, το ύψος, τη χώρα, τους ορεσιβίους, τις φωτογραφίες, κ.λπ. 
του βουνού εν λόγω.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschung der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschliche Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exploration de la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie humaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exploração da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia humana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplorazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geografia umana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξερεύνηση της γης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρώπινη γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
